item.description:
Fire is an inner Life Force , Emotions are water , and A House is the Self . Have you ever wanted to know what your dreams mean or what your subconscious is trying to tell you? These are just a few definitions that have enhanced an understanding of myself.

Now you can Learn the Importance of Dreams, How to Remember your Dreams, Use your Dreams to Problem Solve, and Better Understand Dream Symbols.

It still amazes me to this day how Betty Bethards Dream Book has helped me to really know myself. Sometimes, I understand my dream instantly upon awakening.

Come join me and discover how using both The Law of Attraction & The Dream Book: Symbols for Self Understanding by Betty Bethards can enhance a greater understand to your inner desires.

THE BEST Dream Book ever written. I never use anything else!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us in the back Room or by the long bench near fireplace

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Using your Dreams to Manifest Your Desires
